definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Legend No. 9, for piano, 4 hands in D major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴四手联弹而作的第9传奇曲。

sentences.english: Slavonic Dance No. 11 for piano, 4 hands in F major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴四手联弹而作的第11斯拉夫舞曲。

sentences.english: The disadvantage is that not all major and minor chords can be played with all six strings at once.
sentences.chinese: 弊端是并非所有的大调小调都可以用这调弦按出来。

sentences.english: Slavonic Dance No. 15 for piano, 4 hands in C major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴四手联弹而作的第15斯拉夫舞曲。

sentences.english: The above open tunings all give a major chord with open strings.
sentences.chinese: 上述的开放调弦的空弦音都是一个大调和弦。

sentences.english: Legend No. 4, for orchestra in C major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为管弦乐队而作的第4传奇曲。

sentences.english: Legend No. 9, for orchestra in D major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为管弦乐队而作的第9传奇曲。

sentences.english: Eclogue No. 2, for piano in D major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴而作的第2田园诗曲。

sentences.english: This is his Symphony No.5 in B-flat so let's listen to this.
sentences.chinese: 我们要听的来自他的降B大调第五交响曲。

sentences.english: Sonata No. 31 in A-flat Major for Piano, Op. 110
sentences.chinese: 第三十一号钢琴奏鸣曲，升A大调，作品110。

sentences.english: Eclogue No. 3, for piano in G major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴而作的第3田园诗曲。

sentences.english: Bassoon Quartet in F major, Op. 1, No. 2
sentences.chinese: 大调巴松四重奏，作品第1号，第二首。

sentences.english: Piano Trio in E flat major, Op.
sentences.chinese: 钢琴三重奏在电子商务大调，作品。

sentences.english: I sat down at the piano and launched into Bach's Toccata in C major.
sentences.chinese: 我在钢琴前坐了下来，开始弹奏巴赫的托卡塔C大调。

sentences.english: Brahms' Intermezzo in A Major, Op. 118, No. 2
sentences.chinese: 布拉姆斯的A大调间奏曲，作品118，第2首。

sentences.english: Legend No. 2, for orchestra in G major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为管弦乐队而作的第2传奇曲。

definition: tonic triad/triad of the home key
triad/musical chord of three notes, such as major triad do-mi-so
tone mark on a Chinese syllable (i.e. accents on ā á ǎ à)/(music) key signature
